name: Balance (itch) (Jessica R. Balfe)
description:
Balance is a cooperative puzzle game using one keyboard or one controller. You and a friend are split apart and need to help each other traverse through 3 mazes and come together again.

Said to be a "Whale of a good time" by play testers.

Drnumb as Level Designer and Concept Art

Jessica R. Balfe as Coder and Artist

Music - "Jazzin' Babies' Blues" by King Oliver's Jazz Band recorded 1923
